title: Kailash Mansarovar Yatra 8 Nights 9 Days - Helicopter Route
description: Experience the sacred Kailash Mansarovar Yatra via helicopter route from Lucknow. This premium 9-day journey combines helicopter flights with the spiritual pilgrimage, offering comfort and convenience while maintaining the sacred essence of the yatra. The helicopter route significantly reduces travel time while providing breathtaking aerial views of the Himalayas.
highlights: Helicopter flights from Simikot to Hilsa for comfort and time-saving
Holy bath and prayers at Lake Mansarovar
Reduced travel time with premium helicopter transfers
Professional spiritual guide with deep knowledge
Medical support and Gamow bag for altitude safety
Small group experience for personalized attention
Aerial views of the majestic Himalayas
Visit to ancient Tibetan monasteries and temples
inclusions: All meals during the tour (breakfast, lunch, dinner)
Tibet travel permits and Chinese visa assistance
Professional spiritual guide and support staff
All ground transportation in private vehicles
Gamow bag for altitude sickness prevention
First aid kit and basic medical support
Sleeping bags and basic trekking equipment
exclusions: Tips for guide, driver, and support staff
Personal medical kit and Diamox tablets
Extra accommodation due to flight delays
Any meals not mentioned in inclusions

itinerary.title: Arrival Lucknow - Drive to Nepalgunj (150m)
itinerary.description: Upon arrival at Lucknow Airport, you will be greeted by our representative. After completing customs formalities, drive to Nepalgunj (200km, 5-6 hours). Check-in at Hotel Diamond Palace or Lord Plaza. Evening yatra briefing session before dinner to prepare for the spiritual journey ahead.

itinerary.title: Nepalgunj - Fly to Simikot (2800m)
itinerary.description: After breakfast, transfer to domestic airport for flight to Simikot (45 minutes). Upon arrival at Simikot airport, transfer to hotel for check-in. Evening short walk to Lord Shiva Temple for prayers. Rest and acclimatization at this altitude.

itinerary.title: Simikot - Helicopter to Hilsa - Drive to Purang (3700m)
itinerary.description: After breakfast, helicopter flight to Hilsa (20 minutes, 15kg baggage weight limit). Wait for other group members to arrive. Complete border formalities and immigration procedures. Drive to Purang (35km, 1.5 hours). Check-in at guest house and rest.

itinerary.title: Acclimatization Day in Purang (3900m)
itinerary.description: Important acclimatization day to adjust to high altitude. Light activities around Purang town. Medical check-up and preparation for higher altitudes. Visit local market and interact with Tibetan culture. Rest and hydration are essential.

itinerary.title: Purang - Mansarovar Lake Parikrama (4550m)
itinerary.description: Drive to sacred Lake Mansarovar (102km, 4-5 hours). Upon arrival, perform holy bath in the sacred waters. Conduct prayers, puja, and homa ceremony. Experience the spiritual energy of this most sacred lake. Overnight at lakeside accommodation.

itinerary.title: Mansarovar - Darchen - Trek to Deraphuk (4860m)
itinerary.description: Drive to Darchen (58km, 2 hours), the starting point of Kailash Parikrama. Begin the sacred circumambulation of Mount Kailash. Trek to Deraphuk (12km). First glimpse of the north face of Mount Kailash. Overnight in guest house.

itinerary.title: Deraphuk - Dolma La Pass - Zutalphuk (4600m)
itinerary.description: Most challenging day of the yatra. Cross Dolma La Pass (5630m), the highest point of Parikrama. Spiritual significance of leaving behind past sins. Trek to Zutalphuk (22km). Physically demanding but spiritually most rewarding day.

itinerary.title: Zutalphuk - Darchen - Drive to Hilsa (3700m)
itinerary.description: Complete the sacred Parikrama with final trek to Darchen (8km, 3 hours). Meet with vehicle and merge with other group members. Drive to Hilsa for border crossing. Complete China-Nepal border formalities. Overnight at Hilsa.

itinerary.title: Hilsa - Helicopter to Simikot - Fly to Nepalgunj - Drive to Lucknow
itinerary.description: After breakfast, helicopter flight to Simikot (20 minutes). Connect with flight from Simikot to Nepalgunj (50 minutes). Upon arrival in Nepalgunj, transfer to hotel for freshening up, then drive to Lucknow for final departure.

important_notes.health_requirements: Medical fitness certificate required. Consult your doctor about high altitude travel ability. Age limit: 18-70 years. Heart patients, pregnant women, and those with serious medical conditions should avoid this tour.
important_notes.altitude_sickness: Symptoms include headache, nausea, breathlessness, and exhaustion. Carry Diamox tablets. We provide Gamow bag for emergency treatment. Drink plenty of water and avoid alcohol/smoking.
important_notes.currency: Chinese Yuan (CNY). USD 1 = 7.02 Yuan approximately. Exchange money at Bank of China in Kyirung county. Exchange remaining Yuan before departure.
important_notes.fitness_requirements: Good physical fitness required for high altitude trekking. Regular walking/jogging recommended before the tour. Mental preparation for spiritual journey is equally important.
important_notes.weather_conditions: Weather can be unpredictable. Temperature ranges from -10°C to 15°C. Carry layered clothing. Monsoon season (July-August) may cause flight delays.
important_notes.helicopter_details: Helicopter flights are weather dependent. 15kg baggage limit per person. Flights may be delayed or cancelled due to weather conditions. Alternative arrangements will be made if necessary.
important_notes.risks_and_liability: Tours conducted under Tibet Tourism Bureau regulations. Company not responsible for changes due to natural disasters, political unrest, flight cancellations, or medical emergencies. Travel insurance mandatory.
